definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
coco de mer or "sea coconut" (Lodoicea maldivica)
Asian palm civet (Paradoxurus hermaphroditus), also called toddy cat

sentences.english: The watery fluid in the central cavity of the coconut, used chiefly as a beverage.
sentences.chinese: 从椰子果肉中提取的奶状液体，用于食物或作为饮料。

sentences.english: Intense, coconut and vanilla, with a hint of sultana, lemon and peat.
sentences.chinese: 激烈，椰子和香草，并暗示苏丹娜，柠檬和泥炭。

sentences.english: This dance is accompanied by percussion instruments, including drums and coconut shells.
sentences.chinese: 这种舞蹈要配合鼓和椰子壳类的打击乐器来表演。

sentences.english: Ladies, try sleeping with coconut oil on your face at night.
sentences.chinese: 女孩子们可在脸上涂抹椰子油入睡。

sentences.english: Agriculture provides the economic base with major exports made up of copra and citrus fruit.
sentences.chinese: 农业以提供干椰子肉和柑橘类的出口为经济基础。

sentences.english: A coconut tree is in front of my house.
sentences.chinese: 在我家房子前面有一颗椰子树。

sentences.english: Reach for coconut water instead of a sports drink when you wake up.
sentences.chinese: 你醒来时应该喝一杯椰子水，而非一瓶运动饮料。

sentences.english: Mix the sugar and jelly powder for the coconut pudding.
sentences.chinese: 把椰子布丁中的砂糖与果冻粉混合。

sentences.english: Why Is There Always a Soft Spot in a Cocoanut Shell?
sentences.chinese: 为什么椰子壳上总会有一个软的部位？

sentences.english: Cold pressed coconut oil from more than made fresh coconut .
sentences.chinese: 冷榨椰子油多由新鲜椰子制成。

sentences.english: Cold pressed coconut oil from more than made fresh coconut .
sentences.chinese: 冷榨椰子油多由新鲜椰子制成。

sentences.english: A handsome summer in Hainan with blue water and sweet coconut.
sentences.chinese: 一位俊秀的夏天在海南有蓝色的水和甜椰子。

sentences.english: Can skin allergy drink coco water?
sentences.chinese: 皮肤过敏能不能喝椰子水？

sentences.english: In the Philippines the cultivation of Nipa for alcohol production has been practised on a considerable scale for many years.
sentences.chinese: 菲律宾多年来大规模种植海椰子以生产酒精。

sentences.english: To those people who resided within the tropical zones old coconut shells and mussel shells were commonly employed.
sentences.chinese: 居住在热带地区的人普遍采用老椰子壳和贻贝壳。

sentences.english: Besides palmaceous plants such as coconut, Palm leaf beetle Brontispa longissim(Gestro) also endangers banana.
sentences.chinese: 椰心叶甲除危害椰子等棕榈科植物外，还危害香蕉。

definition: nata de coco (a chewy jelly made from fermented coconut water)
